definition: to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to overtake on a bend (driving)/(fig.) taking opportunity of tight corners to make swift progress (economy etc)

sentences.english: A curved margin of a highway was reflectorized for safety.
sentences.chinese: 爲安全起見公路的彎道邊上裝設了反射鏡。

sentences.english: Prefabricated modular bays of hot dip galvanized balustrading are constructed off site.
sentences.chinese: 熱沾電渡欄杆的預製彎道模型是建造在場所之外的。

sentences.english: Bi-xenon headlights, dynamic headlight range adjustment, with fixed bending light.
sentences.chinese: 雙氙氣大燈，照明範圍自動調節，帶靜態彎道照明。

sentences.english: You'll also want to avoid tight turns, so look for slow curves and straight paths.
sentences.chinese: 還要避免急轉彎，所以儘量尋找溫和的彎道和直道。

sentences.english: Hairpin followed hairpin, rainforest gave way to pine.
sentences.chinese: 經過一個接一個的U形彎道，松樹林取代了雨林。

sentences.english: I lost ground at turn four on the first lap, and [Nico] Rosberg got past me.
sentences.chinese: 在第一圈的第四個彎道羅斯伯格超過了我。

sentences.english: Eg - they brake too late and wash out wide of the apex and have to reduce speed etc.
sentences.chinese: 他們剎車太晚衝過彎道頂點並減速。

sentences.english: Last year the highway was redesigned to broaden the curves and improve roadway visibility.
sentences.chinese: 去年高速公路進行了改造，加寬了彎道並改善了視野。

sentences.english: The rollover accident happened at a curve just 9 km from the start point.
sentences.chinese: 翻車發生在距離出發點9公里左右的一個彎道。

sentences.english: Start your turn by slowly edging your skis , keep an anticipated re-position until you reach halfway.
sentences.chinese: 通過慢慢立刃來開始轉彎，沿預定路線進入彎道。

sentences.english: As I said, it's one corner with two kerbs.
sentences.chinese: 正如我說過的，這是一個帶兩個路肩的彎道。

sentences.english: At the curve in the road where his cab had caught fire, the interstate was streaked with black ash.
sentences.chinese: 在他的卡車着火的彎道，洲際公路上都是黑灰。

sentences.english: Straights of varying length and curves of varying degrees appear automatically.
sentences.chinese: 長短不一的直軌和不同弧度的彎道會自動出現。

sentences.english: This hole has a dogleg to the left.
sentences.chinese: 這個球洞有個朝左的彎道。

sentences.english: The flow in open channel bends is one of the most familiar forms in hydropower projects.
sentences.chinese: 明渠彎道水流是工程實際中經常碰到的一種水流形式。

sentences.english: The curve equations are also shown in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 給出與之相匹配的該機頭尾星輪彎道曲線方程。

definition: dangers spring up all around (idiom); surrounded by perils
(of two vehicles traveling in opposite directions) to pass by each other
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2
